title: I am getting sick of this.. stop in the champion select.
body:
I want to add screenshots so i can prove too.
By the way, the client always had trouble, in the champion select, the client stop 
and I cant do anything about other than dodge or restart game which means,
I get penalty deducted points and time penalty as well.
I ruined my promotion 2times caused of that, and also wasting my time.
It happend about 10times. please do something about this.. 
seriously you guys need to fix this thing, everyone is having suffer from this.

my more than 50point more than 50min are wasted from this error.

replies.body:
I'm not 100% what's going on here, but it sounds like your client is freezing during champion select which ends up getting you kicked out of the lobby. If that's the case, there might be some corrupted files used in champion select that are causing the game to freeze. 

Go through the steps in our [**Crash Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974) so that we can narrow down the main issue. Also be sure to test any of these changes in a _**custom game**_ so that you don't get hit with any penalties.

Again, in my promo I got tis again freezing during champion select , and my promo is over 
This is third time now , this is ridiculous, I have received   - 50point  , 3times of fail on promo , wasted all my time.
Thank you Riot best game!

Since the steps in that guide weren't able to help at all, there might be a much smaller issue affecting your client. Hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so that we can take a closer look!
